# Atomic Organizations - Project Guidelines

## Project Type
Next.js 15+ Application with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS

## Content Rules

**CRITICAL: Never use em dashes or en dashes anywhere in the codebase. Only use standard hyphens "-" at all times.**

This rule applies to:
- All React components
- All content strings
- All documentation
- All comments
- All configuration files

## Project Structure

Premium B2B website for sales performance coaching, targeting CROs, VPs of Sales, and Revenue Leaders.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS (custom AO color palette)
- Framer Motion for animations
- Calendly integration for consultations

## Design Principles
- Clean, advisory, premium B2B aesthetic
- Inspired by modern SaaS sites like zutrue.com
- Generous whitespace and typography rhythm
- Subtle fade-in animations on scroll
- Fully responsive with mobile-first approach

## Development Status
- [x] Project scaffolded
- [x] All components created
- [x] Styling and animations implemented
- [x] Dev server running
- [x] Documentation complete

## Running the Project

Development server:
```bash
npm run dev
```

Access at: http://localhost:3000

## Next Steps
1. Add your Calendly URL to `.env.local`
2. Place logo and wave assets in `/public/logos/` and `/public/waves/`
3. Customize content as needed
4. Deploy to Vercel or your preferred hosting platform
